title: They MUST Be AWARE of the Globalists' DEPOPULATION Plans: China Has NOT Administered a SINGLE mRNAlien "Vaccine" to ANY of Their 1.45 BILLION Citizens
cleaned_text:
Communist China, with a population of 1.45 billion people, has administered at least two billion COVID-19 shots, however, not one of them received the mRNAlien “vaccine” that is being rolled out across the West. China announced in July 2021 that it had decided that the time had come to start working on a vaccine, but didn’t specify when exactly their jab would be rolling out to the public. The first person in the world to receive an mRNA Covid vaccine outside a clinical trial was Margaret Keenan, a 90-year-old Englishwoman, on Dec. 8, 2020. 

 

 In the 14 months since, more than 1 billion people worldwide have received more than 2 billion shots of mRNA.

None are in China. 

 

 A Chinese pharmaceutical company signed a deal to buy 100 million doses of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine a week after that first shot. 

 

 None have been given to anyone in China. 

 

 But wait! 

 

 This delay has a totally innocent explanation. National pride, ya see. The Chinese don’t want to admit they have to buy an American/German shot. 

 

 Yep, that’s the ticket. 

 

 Here’s the proof. Chinese pharmaceutical companies are also “developing” their own mRNA shot, called ARCoV. 

 

 They’re moving fast, too! 

 

 How fast. 

 

 The Chinese companies finished their preliminary human clinical trial of ARCoV on December 2, 2020. It covered all of 230 people. 

 

 Not 2021. 2020. BEFORE Margaret Keenan received her first dose. 

 

 14 months have passed since that trial finished. China may hold off on their rollout, however, since the world is now being plagued with cases of blood clots, found inside the bodies of those who had been given the shot. Embalmer Richard Hirschman stated in a video posted to Brighteon.com by The Prisoner Planet, that 65 percent of the deaths he has personally handled, all had the presence of strange blood clots. “It was probably around May or June of last year when I started noticing I’m getting clots in the arteries. I’m getting really strange, long clots that are holding together and there’s some strength to them. They’re firm, they’re not typical clots that kind of fall apart when you hold on to them. And so that’s where I thought something’s different. Something’s not right.” These are no normal blood clots, as they contain long, stringy elastic structures.

Hirschman said: “Typically a blood clot is smooth. It is blood that’s coagulated together but when you squeeze it, or touch it, or try to pick it up, it generally falls apart. You can almost squeeze between your fingers and almost get it back to blood again. But this white fibrous stuff is pretty strong, it’s not weak at all.” Other embalmers, around 15 in total, only noticed the presence of the clots after they had been made aware after getting a tip off and they too, had not seen anything like them before. Hirschman did say that the clots had been steadily increasing over the past few months but it was hard to say for sure exactly when they started to appear and Hirschman admitted they could have been there as early as January 2021. As yet, there have been no blood clots found in the bodies of the unvaxxed. He did state that his gut was telling him the clots were related to the vax and that if it was vax related, deaths should be expected to rise very soon as people can’t live with these strange clots in their body. “If one of these small fibrous tissues gets up into the brain, they’re going to have a stroke. If it gets into your heart, it’s going to lead you to a heart attack,” Hirschman said. Of course, the mainstream media has been completely ignoring these new findings and his peers are also reluctant to speak out in public. His peers refused to speak out publicly over the matter. Meanwhile, the mainstream media and the medical community are ignoring these findings which show it has the potential to kill between 26,000 and 65,000 deaths per week. recently reported on the Wuhan Institute of Virology, the facility that supposedly released the covid-19 virus, has been found to be carrying out new research into influenza. Researchers at a Chinese military-linked lab, sought avian influenza viruses (AIV) that had “zoonotic potential with human infections.” Details in their report, titled “Scientist in WIV achieves a progress in study on reassortment of influenza viruses,” tells of how researchers from the Wuhan Lab found these viruses in the wild. “In this study, by collaboration with Prof. Qiyun Zhu in Lanzhou Veterinary Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences and Prof. Hualan Chen in Harbin Veterinary Research Institute, the Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Prof. Jie Cui in WIV, carried out surveillance of AIVs in ducks, geese and the environment of a community in Hunan province, China, from 2014–2015,” explains the summary.
